name: UpdateJobCompensation
description:
Update a job's compensation details.

Use this tool to modify the compensation tiers of an existing job. It requires the 'jobsWrite' permission.

parameters.name: job_compensation_details
parameters.description: JSON object with jobId and compensationTiers. Include compensation details such as title, additional information, and components.

title.description: A label that describes the entire range to applicants. Title is required for multi-tier compensation ranges.

components.description: The individual components that make up this compensation range
